summary: This is a calendar entry for a 30-minute meeting on August 13, 2019, concerning 'MCC/Epstein', organized and attended by personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). It indicates an official meeting related to the Epstein case shortly after his arrest and death.

persons.name: (USANYS)
persons.context: Appears as the organizer and an attendee of a meeting concerning 'MCC/Epstein', representing the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Meeting re MCC/Epstein
events.description: A 30-minute meeting was scheduled concerning 'MCC/Epstein', organized and attended by personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

keyFacts: A meeting concerning 'MCC/Epstein' was scheduled for August 13, 2019, at 3:45 PM, lasting 30 minutes.
The meeting was organized and attended by personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The meeting location is listed as 'M. office', which may refer to a specific office within the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The document is a calendar entry created and modified on August 13, 2019, indicating planning for official business related to the Epstein case.
The meeting occurred shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death in custody on August 10, 2019.
